import { useState } from 'react'; import RadioButtonGroup from './RadioButtonGroup'; import CheckboxGroup from './CheckboxGroup'; import RegularSlider from './RegularSlider'; function OptionsContainer( props ) { const [ preferences, setPreferences ] = useState([]); const sendDataToParent = (prefIndex, newValue) => { let newPref = [...preferences] newPref[prefIndex] = newValue; setPreferences(newPref); } return (
{/* X-AXIS OPTIONS */}

Horisontal axis

{/* Y-AXIS OPTIONS */}

Vertical axis

{/* POSITIONS OPTIONS */}

Select positions

{/* MINUTES OPTIONS */}

Min. minutes played

{/* MAX PRICE */}

Max. price

{/* TEAMS OPTIONS */}

Select team

{/* AVAILABILITY */}

Player availability

{/* SHOW NAMES */}

Show names

) } export default OptionsContainer;
